results.name: Coefficients from fractional iteration of exp(x) -1.
reference: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 148.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..200

Rosenberg, Ivo; The number of maximal closed classes in the set of functions over a finite domain, J. Combinatorial Theory Ser. A 14 (1973), 1-7. See Table I (it is not certain that this is the same sequence. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 25 2015)

maple: a:= n->(add((j+1)*Stirling2(n-1, j), j=2..n-1)): seq(a(n), n=3..31); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 18 2007
program: (Sage) [bell_number(n)-2 for n in (3..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 13 2019
(GAP) List([3..30], n-> Bell(n)-2); # _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 13 2019
